code: import React from"react";import PropTypes from"prop-types";import{Helmet}from"react-helmet";import{useStaticQuery}from"gatsby";function SEO(_ref){var description=_ref.description,lang=_ref.lang,meta=_ref.meta,title=_ref.title;var _useStaticQuery=useStaticQuery("63159454"),site=_useStaticQuery.site;var metaDescription=description||site.siteMetadata.description;return React.createElement(Helmet,{htmlAttributes:{lang:lang},title:title,titleTemplate:"%s | "+site.siteMetadata.title,meta:[{name:"description",content:metaDescription},{property:"og:title",content:title},{property:"og:description",content:metaDescription},{property:"og:type",content:"website"},{name:"twitter:card",content:"summary"},{name:"twitter:creator",content:site.siteMetadata.author},{name:"twitter:title",content:title},{name:"twitter:description",content:metaDescription}].concat(meta)});}SEO.defaultProps={lang:"en",meta:[],description:""};SEO.propTypes={description:PropTypes.string,lang:PropTypes.string,meta:PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.object),title:PropTypes.string.isRequired};export default SEO;
